definition: cleaning implement consisting of absorbent material fastened to a handle, make a sad face and thrust out one's lower lip
details:
noun
- cleaning implement consisting of absorbent material fastened to a handle
= synonyms: swab
verb
- make a sad face and thrust out one's lower lip
= example: make a sad face and thrust out one's lower lip
= synonyms: pout
- to wash or wipe with or as if with a mop
= synonyms: mop up
